answers.answer: Yes the chances are your body is unable to handle the sugar. Kinda common for people with Hep-c.  If you do a search you can find the reasons for it.  Not to bum you out but there seems to be a link between liver fibrosis and diabetes.  Be carefull with what you take to control it as the meds are really hard on your liver.  Diet and exersise is your best bet, Diabetes is how I found out I had hep-c 5 years ago and I am more healthy now the I was then. As a matter a fact most people with diabetes are healthy because they eat right and exersise.  Good LuckRon
